welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salinas, where the beauty of the coastal landscape meets the charm of a small town. Known for its agricultural history and the hometown of John Steinbeck, we invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Empanadas Santa Fé
restaurants.description: Empanadas Santa Fé is a empanada restaurant located in Salinas.
restaurants.address: Ruta Interbalnearia km 38 (e/ Av. Julieta y Arazá), Salinas Canelones

restaurants.name: Burdeos
restaurants.description: Burdeos is a restaurant located in Pinar Sur.
restaurants.address: Av Artigas (al final) (Desembocadura del Arroyo Pando), 15003 Pinar Sur Canelones

restaurants.name: Papacho
restaurants.description: Papacho is a gastropub located in Salinas.

restaurants.name: Panadería Salinas
restaurants.description: Panadería Salinas is a bakery located in Salinas.

restaurants.name: La Rueda
restaurants.description: La Rueda is a pizzeria located in Salinas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salinas Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Salinas Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monterey Peninsula Airport serves domestic and international flights. It features a variety of amenities including shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Monterey Peninsula Airport is a smaller terminal used for regional and commuter flights. It offers a more relaxed and intimate atmosphere for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marina Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Marina Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hollister Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
